trans-unit.source: Await {0} instead
trans-unit.target: Attendono invece {0}
trans-unit.note: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated. {0} is a method name.

trans-unit.source: Use await instead
trans-unit.target: Uso aspettano invece
trans-unit.note: "await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Synchronously waiting on tasks or awaiters may cause deadlocks. Use JoinableTaskFactory.Run instead.
trans-unit.target: Sincrono attesa sui compiti o awaiters è pericoloso e può causare blocchi morti. Si prega di considerare le seguenti opzioni: 1) passare alla asincrona di attesa se il chiamante è già un metodo di "async". 2) cambiamento attendono la catena dei chiamanti per essere metodi "async" e quindi modificare questo codice per essere asincrona. 3) uso JoinableTaskFactory.Run() di attendere le attività o awaiters. Fare riferimento a http://blogs.msdn.com/b/andrewarnottms/archive/2014/05/07/asynchronous-and-multithreaded-programming-within-vs-using-the-joinabletaskfactory.aspx per maggiori informazioni.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
"await" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid problematic synchronous waits
trans-unit.target: Sincrono attesa sui compiti o awaiters è pericoloso e può causare blocchi morti.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio service "{0}" should be used on main thread explicitly. Call ThreadHelper.ThrowIfNotOnUIThread() or await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() first.
trans-unit.target: Servizio di Visual Studio "{0}" deve essere utilizzato in modo esplicito sul thread principale. Si prega di verificare sia il thread corrente è il thread principale, o passa al thread principale in modo asincrono. 1) API per verificare il thread corrente sono il thread principale: ThreadHelper.ThrowIfNotOnUIThread(), o IThreadHandling.VerifyOnUIThread(). 2) API per passare a principale del filetto in modo asincrono: JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync(), o IThreadHandling.SwitchToUIThread(). Fare riferimento a http://blogs.msdn.com/b/andrewarnottms/archive/2014/05/07/asynchronous-and-multithreaded-programming-within-vs-using-the-joinabletaskfactory.aspx per maggiori informazioni.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Use VS services from UI thread
trans-unit.target: Servizio di Visual Studio deve essere utilizzato in modo esplicito sul thread principale.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid "async void" methods, because any exceptions not handled by the method will crash the process.
trans-unit.target: Evitare il metodo Async Void, perché tutte le eccezioni generate da un metodo void async verranno generate direttamente su SynchronizationContext e andrà in crash il processo. Fare riferimento a https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/jj991977.aspx per maggiori informazioni.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
"async void" is a pair of C# keywords. Do not translate them.

trans-unit.source: Avoid async void methods
trans-unit.target: Evitare il metodo Async Void.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
"async void" is a pair of C# keywords. Do not translate them.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using async lambda for a void returning delegate type, because any exceptions not handled by the delegate will crash the process.
trans-unit.target: Evitare di utilizzare lambda async come tipo delegato ritorno void, perché tutte le eccezioni generate da una lambda async restituisce void verranno generate direttamente su SynchronizationContext e andrà in crash il processo. Fare riferimento a https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/jj991977.aspx per maggiori informazioni.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
"void" is a C# keyword and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid unsupported async delegates
trans-unit.target: Lambda Async sta usanda come tipo delegato ritorno void.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: AsyncEventHandler delegates should be invoked via the extension method "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" defined in Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading assembly.
trans-unit.target: AsyncEventHandler delegati devono essere richiamati tramite il metodo di estensione "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" definito nell'assembly Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading.

trans-unit.source: Use InvokeAsync to raise async events
trans-unit.target: AsyncEventHandler delegati devono essere richiamati tramite il metodo di estensione "TplExtensions.InvokeAsync()" definito nell'assembly Microsoft.VisualStudio.Threading.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Calling await on a Task inside a JoinableTaskFactory.Run, when the task is initialized outside the delegate can cause potential deadlocks. You can avoid this problem by ensuring the task is initialized within the delegate or by using JoinableTask instead of Task.
trans-unit.target: Chiamata attendono un'attività all'interno di un JoinableTaskFactory.Run, quando l'attività viene inizializzato all'esterno il delegato può causare potenziali deadlock. è possibile evitare questo problema assicurando l'attività viene inizializzata all'interno del delegato o utilizzando JoinableTask invece di attività.

trans-unit.source: Avoid awaiting non-joinable tasks in join contexts
trans-unit.target: Evitare chiamate attendono attività all'interno di "JoinableTaskFactory.Run" delegato quando l'attività è definita di fuori del delegato per evitare potenziali deadlock.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Lazy<Task<T>>.Value can deadlock. Use AsyncLazy<T> instead.
trans-unit.target: Chiamando pigro<Task<T>>. Valore possa causare un deadlock quando la fabbrica di valore è stata avviata in precedenza. è invece necessario utilizzare AsyncLazy<T> .
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid using Lazy<T> where T is a Task<T2>
trans-unit.target: Evitare di utilizzare Lazy <T> dove T è un compito.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: {0} synchronously blocks. Await {1} instead.
trans-unit.target: Il membro di {0} blocca in modo sincrono. Chiamare invece {1} e attende il relativo risultato.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: {0} synchronously blocks. Use await instead.
trans-unit.target: Il membro di {0} blocca in modo sincrono. Uso aspettano invece.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Call async methods when in an async method
trans-unit.target: Chiamare awaitable alternative quando in un metodo asincrono.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Limit use of synchronously blocking method calls such as JoinableTaskFactory.Run or Task.Result to public entrypoint members where you must be synchronous. Using it for internal members can needlessly add synchronous frames between asynchronous frames, leading to threadpool exhaustion.
trans-unit.target: Limitare l'uso di bloccare in modo sincrono chiamate a metodi quali JoinableTaskFactory.Run o Task. Result per membri entrypoint pubblico dove si deve essere sincrona. Utilizzarlo per i membri interni possa aggiungere inutilmente sincroni fotogrammi tra i fotogrammi asincrone, che conduce all'esaurimento threadpool.

trans-unit.source: Implement internal logic asynchronously
trans-unit.target: Evitare blocchi sincrone a metodi non pubblici.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Rename to {0}
trans-unit.target: Rinominare {0}.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.
{0} is a method name.

trans-unit.source: Use "Async" suffix in names of Task-returning methods.
trans-unit.target: Usare il suffisso "Async" nei nomi di metodo attività-restituendo.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Use "Async" suffix for async methods
trans-unit.target: Usare il suffisso "Async" nei nomi di metodo attività-restituendo.
trans-unit.note: Please verify the translation’s accuracy as the source string was updated after it was translated.

trans-unit.source: Change return type to Task
trans-unit.target: Cambia tipo di ritorno all'attività
trans-unit.note: Task is a type name and should not be translated.

trans-unit.source: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current. Use an overload that accepts a TaskScheduler and specify TaskScheduler.Default (or any other) explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Evitare gli overload di metodo che assumono TaskScheduler. Utilizzare un overload che accetta un oggetto TaskScheduler e specificare in modo esplicito TaskScheduler (o qualsiasi altro).

trans-unit.source: Avoid method overloads that assume TaskScheduler.Current
trans-unit.target: Evitare gli overload di metodo che assumono TaskScheduler

trans-unit.source: Provide an instance of JoinableTaskFactory in this call (or another overload) to avoid deadlocks with the main thread.
trans-unit.target: Provide an instance of JoinableTaskFactory in this call (or another overload) to avoid deadlocks with the main thread.

trans-unit.source: Provide JoinableTaskFactory where allowed
trans-unit.target: Provide JoinableTaskFactory where allowed

trans-unit.source: Expose an async version of this method that does not synchronously block. Then simplify this method to call that async method within a JoinableTaskFactory.Run delegate.
trans-unit.target: Expose an async version of this method that does not synchronously block. Then simplify this method to call that async method within a JoinableTaskFactory.Run delegate.

trans-unit.source: Offer async methods
trans-unit.target: Offer async methods

trans-unit.source: Await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() to switch to the UI thread instead of APIs that can deadlock or require specifying a priority.
trans-unit.target: Await JoinableTaskFactory.SwitchToMainThreadAsync() to switch to the UI thread instead of APIs that can deadlock or require specifying a priority.

trans-unit.source: Avoid legacy threading switching APIs
trans-unit.target: Avoid legacy threading switching APIs
